TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit XmlReader extends System.Object implements class System.IDisposable
Public MustInherit Class XmlReader Implements IDisposable
public ref class XmlReader abstract : IDisposable

summary.span: 表示提供快速、非快取、順向 (Forward-only) 存取 XML 資料的讀取器 (Reader)。

span.span: Represents a reader that provides fast, noncached, forward-only access to XML data.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 提供順向、 唯讀存取文件或資料流中的 XML 資料。 provides forward-only, read-only access to XML data in a document or stream. 此類別符合 W3C[可延伸標記語言 (XML) 1.0 （第四版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)並[Namespaces in XML 1.0 （第三個版本）](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/)建議。This class conforms to the W3C [Extensible Markup Language (XML) 1.0 (fourth edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) and the [Namespaces in XML 1.0 (third edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/REC-xml-names/) recommendations. 方法可讓您透過 XML 資料移動，並讀取節點的內容。 methods let you move through XML data and read the contents of a node. 此類別的屬性會反映目前的節點，也就是將讀取器置於其中的值。屬性值表示 XML 讀取器的目前狀態。The properties of the class reflect the value of the current node, which is where the reader is positioned.The property value indicates the current state of the XML reader. 比方說，此屬性設為所方法並由方法。For example, the property is set to by the method and by the method. 也提供的資料一致性檢查和針對 DTD 或結構描述進行驗證。 also provides data conformance checks and validation against a DTD or schema. 您可以使用提取模型來擷取資料。 uses a pull model to retrieve data. 此模型中：This model: - 狀態管理簡化自然、 上下程序的精緻化。Simplifies state management by a natural, top-down procedural refinement. - 支援多個輸入資料流和分層。Supports multiple input streams and layering. - 可讓用戶端給予剖析器到其中的字串會直接寫入，並因此會避免額外的字串複本的緩衝區。Enables the client to give the parser a buffer into which the string is directly written, and thus avoids the necessity of an extra string copy. - 支援選擇性處理程序。Supports selective processing. 用戶端可以略過項目，並處理這些感興趣的應用程式。The client can skip items and process those that are of interest to the application. 您也可以設定屬性，以管理 XML 資料流 （例如正規化） 的處理方式。You can also set properties in advance to manage how the XML stream is processed (for example, normalization). 本節內容：In this section: [建立 XML 讀取器](#xmlreader_create) [Creating an XML reader](#xmlreader_create) [驗證 XML 資料](#xmlreader_validate) [Validating XML data](#xmlreader_validate) [資料一致性](#xmlreader_data) [Data conformance](#xmlreader_data) [瀏覽節點](#xmlreader_nodes) [Navigating through nodes](#xmlreader_nodes) [讀取 XML 項目](#xmlreader_elements) [Reading XML elements](#xmlreader_elements) [讀取 XML 屬性](#xmlreader_attributes) [Reading XML attributes](#xmlreader_attributes) [讀取 XML 內容](#xmlreader_content) [Reading XML content](#xmlreader_content) [將轉換成 CLR 類型](#xmlreader_clr) [Converting to CLR types](#xmlreader_clr) [非同步程式設計](#xmlreader_async) [Asynchronous programming](#xmlreader_async) [安全性考量Security considerations](#xmlreader_security) ## 建立 XML 讀取器Creating an XML reader 使用方法用來建立執行個體。Use the method to create an instance. 雖然.NET Framework 提供的具體實作類別，例如， ，和類別，我們建議您只有在這些情況下，使用特定的類別：Although the .NET Framework provides concrete implementations of the class, such as the , , and the classes, we recommend that you use the specialized classes only in these scenarios: - 當您想要讀取從 XML DOM 樹狀子目錄物件，請使用類別。When you want to read an XML DOM subtree from an object, use the class. （不過，此類別不支援 DTD 或結構描述驗證。）(However, this class doesn't support DTD or schema validation.) - 如果您必須展開要求的實體，您不想將文字內容正規化，或您不想預設傳回的屬性，請使用類別。If you must expand entities on request, you don't want your text content normalized, or you don't want default attributes returned, use the class. 若要指定您想要的 XML 讀取器上啟用的功能集，請傳遞物件至方法。To specify the set of features you want to enable on the XML reader, pass an object to the method. 您可以使用單一要使用相同的功能，建立多個讀取器的物件，或修改物件來建立新的讀取器與一組不同的功能。You can use a single object to create multiple readers with the same functionality, or modify the object to create a new reader with a different set of features. 此外，您也很容易可以將功能加入至現有讀取器。You can also easily add features to an existing reader. 如果您未使用物件時，會使用預設設定。If you don't use a object, default settings are used. 請參閱參考頁面，如需詳細資訊。See the reference page for details. 會擲回xml 剖析錯誤。 throws an on XML parse errors. 擲回例外狀況之後，讀取器的狀態不是可預測的。After an exception is thrown, the state of the reader is not predictable. 例如，回報的節點型別可能不同於目前節點的實際節點型別。For example, the reported node type may be different from the actual node type of the current node. 使用檢查讀取器是否處於錯誤狀態的屬性。Use the property to check whether the reader is in error state. ## 驗證 XML 資料Validating XML data 若要定義 XML 文件和其項目關聯性、 資料類型及內容條件約束的結構，您可以使用文件類型定義 (DTD) 或 XML 結構描述定義語言 (XSD) 結構描述。To define the structure of an XML document and its element relationships, data types, and content constraints, you use a document type definition (DTD) or XML Schema definition language (XSD) schema. XML 文件會被視為格式正確符合所定義的所有句法要求時，才[W3C XML 1.0 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。An XML document is considered to be well formed if it meets all the syntactical requirements defined by the [W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). 如果它的格式正確，而且符合其 DTD 或結構描述所定義的條件約束，則被視為有效。It's considered valid if it's well formed and also conforms to the constraints defined by its DTD or schema. (請參閱[W3C XML 結構描述第 1 部分： 結構](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/)並[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)建議。)因此，雖然所有有效 XML 文件的格式都正確，但是並非所有格式正確的 XML 文件都有效。(See the [W3C XML Schema Part 1: Structures](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-1/) and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) recommendations.) Therefore, although all valid XML documents are well formed, not all well-formed XML documents are valid. 您可以針對驗證資料 DTD 中，內嵌 XSD 結構描述，或 XSD 結構描述儲存在物件 （快取）; 將說明這些情況在參考頁面。You can validate the data against a DTD, an inline XSD Schema, or an XSD Schema stored in an object (a cache); these scenarios are described on the reference page. 不支援 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 結構描述驗證。 doesn't support XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema validation. 您可以使用下列設定上類別，以指定哪一種驗證，如果有的話，執行個體可支援。You use the following settings on the class to specify what type of validation, if any, the instance supports. |使用此成員Use this member|若要指定To specify| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|----------------| | 屬性 property|是否允許 DTD 處理。Whether to allow DTD processing. 預設不允許 DTD 處理。The default is to disallow DTD processing.| | 屬性 property|讀取器是否應該驗證資料，以及要執行 （DTD 或結構描述） 的驗證型別。Whether the reader should validate data, and what type of validation to perform (DTD or schema). 預設不進行資料驗證。The default is no data validation.| | 事件 event|事件處理常式接收驗證事件的相關資訊。An event handler for receiving information about validation events. 如果未提供事件處理常式，會在第一次發生驗證錯誤時擲回 。If an event handler is not provided, an is thrown on the first validation error.| | 屬性 property|其他驗證選項，透過列舉成員：Additional validation options through the enumeration members:

- `AllowXmlAttributes`-允許 XML 屬性 (`xml:*`) 即使未定義結構描述中的執行個體文件中。- `AllowXmlAttributes`-- Allow XML attributes (`xml:*`) in instance documents even when they're not defined in the schema. 會根據屬性的資料型別來驗證該屬性。The attributes are validated based on their data type. 請參閱設定在特定案例中使用的參考頁面。See the reference page for the setting to use in specific scenarios. （預設為停用。）(Disabled by default.)
- `ProcessIdentityConstraints` -處理識別條件約束 (`xs:ID`， `xs:IDREF`， `xs:key`， `xs:keyref`， `xs:unique`) 在驗證期間發生。- `ProcessIdentityConstraints` --Process identity constraints (`xs:ID`, `xs:IDREF`, `xs:key`, `xs:keyref`, `xs:unique`) encountered during validation. （依預設啟用）。(Enabled by default.)
- `ProcessSchemaLocation` -處理所指定的結構描述`xsi:schemaLocation`或`xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation`屬性。- `ProcessSchemaLocation` --Process schemas specified by the `xsi:schemaLocation` or `xsi:noNamespaceSchemaLocation` attribute. （依預設啟用）。(Enabled by default.)
- `ProcessInlineSchema`-處理驗證期間的內嵌 XML 結構描述。- `ProcessInlineSchema`-- Process inline XML Schemas during validation. （預設為停用。）(Disabled by default.)
- `ReportValidationWarnings`-如果發生驗證警告時，報告事件。- `ReportValidationWarnings`--Report events if a validation warning occurs. 在沒有可以用於驗證特定項目或屬性的 DTD 或 XML 結構描述時，通常會發出警告。A warning is typically issued when there is no DTD or XML Schema to validate a particular element or attribute against. 會使用 來進行通知。The is used for notification. （預設為停用。）(Disabled by default.)| ||用來驗證的 。The to use for validation.| | 屬性 property|解析及存取外部資源。The for resolving and accessing external resources. 這可以包括外部實體，例如 DTD 和結構描述，以及任何`xs:include`或`xs:import`XML 結構描述中包含的項目。This can include external entities such as DTD and schemas, and any `xs:include` or `xs:import` elements contained in the XML Schema. 如果您未指定，則使用的預設值與不具使用者認證。If you don't specify an , the uses a default with no user credentials.| ## 資料一致性Data conformance 所建立的 XML 讀取器方法符合下列的合規性需求的預設值：XML readers that are created by the method meet the following compliance requirements by default: - 新行和屬性值根據正規化 W3C [XML 1.0 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)。New lines and attribute value are normalized according to the W3C [XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/). - 會自動展開所有實體。All entities are automatically expanded. - 即使在不會驗證讀取器時，會固定加入文件類型定義中宣告的預設屬性。Default attributes declared in the document type definition are always added even when the reader doesn't validate. - 允許宣告對應至正確的 XML 命名空間 URI 的 XML 前置詞。Declaration of XML prefix mapped to the correct XML namespace URI is allowed. - 在單一標記法名稱`NotationType`屬性宣告並`NmTokens`在單一`Enumeration`屬性宣告就會不同。The notation names in a single `NotationType` attribute declaration and `NmTokens` in a single `Enumeration` attribute declaration are distinct. 使用這些屬性，以指定的一致性類型檢查您想要啟用：Use these properties to specify the type of conformance checks you want to enable: |使用此屬性Use this property|以To|預設Default| |-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------|-------------| | 屬性 property|啟用或停用檢查下列項目：Enable or disable checks for the following:

字元是合法的 XML 字元的範圍內所定義[2.2 字元](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#charsets)W3C XML 1.0 建議事項一節。- Characters are within the range of legal XML characters, as defined by the [2.2 Characters](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#charsets) section of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation.
-所有的 XML 名稱是否有效，如同[2.3 Common Syntactic Constructs](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#NT-Name) W3C XML 1.0 建議事項一節。- All XML names are valid, as defined by the [2.3 Common Syntactic Constructs](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#NT-Name) section of the W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation.

當這個屬性設定為`true`（預設）、擲回例外狀況是 XML 檔案包含不合法的字元或無效的 XML 名稱 （例如，項目名稱以數字開頭）。When this property is set to `true` (default), an exception is thrown if the XML file contains illegal characters or invalid XML names (for example, an element name starts with a number).|字元且名稱檢查已啟用。Character and name checking is enabled.

將 設為 `false` 會關閉字元實體參考的字元檢查。Setting to `false` turns off character checking for character entity references. 如果讀取器處理文字資料，它會始終檢查 XML 名稱是否有效，而不論此設定。If the reader is processing text data, it always checks that XML names are valid, regardless of this setting. **注意：** 存在 DTD 時，XML 1.0 版建議事項需要文件層級一致性。**Note:** The XML 1.0 recommendation requires document-level conformance when a DTD is present. 因此，如果讀取器設定為支援，但 XML 資料包含文件類型定義 (DTD)，就會擲回。Therefore, if the reader is configured to support , but the XML data contains a document type definition (DTD), an is thrown.| | 屬性 property|選擇強制執行的一致性層級：Choose the level of conformance to enforce:

- .- . 符合的規則[語式正確的 XML 1.0 文件](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed)。Conforms to the rules for a [well-formed XML 1.0 document](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-well-formed).
- .- . 符合格式正確的文件片段做為可使用的規則[外部剖析實體](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities)。Conforms to the rules for a well-formed document fragment that can be consumed as an [external parsed entity](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#wf-entities).
- .- . 符合層級讀取器所決定。Conforms to the level decided by the reader.

如果資料不一致，擲回例外狀況。If the data isn't in conformance, an exception is thrown.|| ## 瀏覽節點Navigating through nodes 目前節點是 XML 讀取器目前所在的 XML 節點。The current node is the XML node on which the XML reader is currently positioned. 所有方法會執行與這個節點及其所有相關的作業屬性會反映目前節點的值。All methods perform operations in relation to this node, and all properties reflect the value of the current node. 下列方法讓您輕鬆瀏覽節點和剖析資料。The following methods make it easy to navigate through nodes and parse data. |使用此方法Use this method|以To| |-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------| ||讀取的第一個節點，並一次前進透過資料流的一個節點。Read the first node, and advance through the stream one node at a time. 這類呼叫通常會執行內`while`迴圈。Such calls are typically performed inside a `while` loop.

使用屬性來取得目前節點的類型 （例如屬性、 註解、 項目，等等）。Use the property to get the type (for example, attribute, comment, element, and so on) of the current node.| ||略過目前節點的子系，並移至下一個節點。Skip the children of the current node and move to the next node.| | 和 and |略過非內容節點，並移至下一個內容節點或檔案結尾。Skip non-content nodes and move to the next content node or to the end of the file.

非內容節點包含， ， ， ，和。Non-content nodes include , , , , and .

內容節點包括非泛空白字元文字， ，和。Content nodes include non-white space text, , , and .| ||讀取項目和其所有子系，並傳回新設為執行個體。Read an element and all its children, and return a new instance set to .

這個方法可用於建立 XML 項目; 周圍的界限例如，如果您想要將資料傳遞至另一個元件進行處理，而且您想要限制您的資料中有多少可以存取元件。This method is useful for creating boundaries around XML elements; for example, if you want to pass data to another component for processing and you want to limit how much of your data the component can access.| 請參閱參考頁面巡覽的文字資料流的一個節點，一次，並顯示每個節點類型的範例。See the reference page for an example of navigating through a text stream one node at a time and displaying the type of each node. 下列各節說明您可以讀取特定類型的資料，例如元素、 屬性的方式，並具型別資料。The following sections describe how you can read specific types of data, such as elements, attributes, and typed data. ## 讀取 XML 項目Reading XML elements 下表列出的方法和屬性，類別提供用於處理項目。The following table lists the methods and properties that the class provides for processing elements. 將 定位於項目上後，節點屬性 (如 ) 就會反映項目值。After the is positioned on an element, the node properties, such as , reflect the element values. 除了下面說明的成員之外，還可以使用 類別的任意一般方法及屬性來處理項目。In addition to the members described below, any of the general methods and properties of the class can also be used to process elements. 例如，您可以使用 方法讀取項目的內容。For example, you can use the method to read the contents of an element. > [!NOTE] > 請參閱第 3.1 節[W3C XML 1.0 建議事項](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-starttags)定義的開始標記、 結束標記與空項目標記。See section 3.1 of the [W3C XML 1.0 Recommendation](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/#sec-starttags) for definitions of start tags, end tags, and empty element tags. |使用此成員Use this member|以To| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------| | 方法 method|檢查目前節點是否開始標記或空白項目標記。Check if the current node is a start tag or an empty element tag.| | 方法 method|檢查目前節點是項目，並使讀取器前進至下一個節點 (呼叫後面接著)。Check that the current node is an element and advance the reader to the next node (calls followed by ).| | 方法 method|檢查目前節點為結尾標記，並使讀取器前進至下一個節點。Check that the current node is an end tag and advance the reader to the next node.| | 方法 method|讀取純文字的項目。Read a text-only element.| | 方法 method|請前往下一個具有指定的名稱的下階 （子系） 元素中的 XML 讀取器。Advance the XML reader to the next descendant (child) element that has the specified name.| | 方法 method|前往下一步 的同層級項目具有指定的名稱的 XML 讀取器。Advance the XML reader to the next sibling element that has the specified name.| | 屬性 property|檢查目前的項目是否具有結尾項目標記。Check if the current element has an end element tag. 例如: For example:

- `` (是`true`。)- `` ( is `true`.)
- ` ` (是`false`，不過，此項目的內容是空的。)- ` ` ( is `false`, although the element's content is empty.)| 如需讀取的項目文字內容的範例，請參閱方法。For an example of reading the text content of elements, see the method. 下列範例會處理項目使用`while`迴圈。The following example processes elements by using a `while` loop. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#10)] ## 讀取 XML 屬性Reading XML attributes XML 屬性最常見於項目，但它們也允許 XML 宣告及文件類型節點上。XML attributes are most commonly found on elements, but they're also allowed on XML declaration and document type nodes. 置於項目節點，方法可讓您瀏覽屬性清單的項目。When positioned on an element node, the method lets you go through the attribute list of the element. 請注意，在後已呼叫節點屬性這類， ，和反映該屬性的屬性、 所屬的項目屬性的屬性。Note that after has been called, node properties such as , , and reflect the properties of that attribute, not the properties of the element the attribute belongs to. 類別會提供這些方法和屬性來讀取和處理項目上的屬性。The class provides these methods and properties to read and process attributes on elements. |使用此成員Use this member|以To| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------| | 屬性 property|檢查目前節點是否具有任何屬性。Check whether the current node has any attributes.| | 屬性 property|取得目前的項目屬性的數目。Get the number of attributes on the current element.| | 方法 method|移動項目中的第一個屬性。Move to the first attribute in an element.| | 方法 method|移至下一個屬性的項目。Move to the next attribute in an element.| | 方法 method|移至指定的屬性。Move to a specified attribute.| | 方法或屬性 method or property|取得指定之屬性的值。Get the value of a specified attribute.| | 屬性 property|檢查目前節點是否為 DTD 或結構描述中定義的預設值所產生的屬性。Check whether the current node is an attribute that was generated from the default value defined in the DTD or schema.| | 方法 method|移至擁有目前屬性的項目。Move to the element that owns the current attribute. 使用這個方法傳回的項目之後瀏覽其屬性。Use this method to return to an element after navigating through its attributes.| | 方法 method|將屬性值剖析成一或多個`Text`， `EntityReference`，或`EndEntity`節點。Parse the attribute value into one or more `Text`, `EntityReference`, or `EndEntity` nodes.| 任何一般 方法和屬性都可用於處理屬性 (Attribute)。Any of the general methods and properties can also be used to process attributes. 例如，將 置於屬性 (Attribute) 上之後， 及 屬性會反映屬性 (Attribute) 的值。For example, after the is positioned on an attribute, the and properties reflect the values of the attribute. 您還可使用任何內容 `Read` 方法，以取得屬性的值。You can also use any of the content `Read` methods to get the value of the attribute. 這個範例會使用來瀏覽項目上的所有屬性的屬性。This example uses the property to navigate through all the attributes on an element. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#1)] 這個範例會使用方法中的`while`迴圈來瀏覽屬性。This example uses the method in a `while` loop to navigate through the attributes. (若要傳回 CLR 型別，請參閱[下一節](#xmlreader_clr)。)(To return CLR types, see the [next section](#xmlreader_clr).) |使用此成員Use this member|以To| |---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------|--------| | 屬性 property|取得目前節點的文字內容。Get the text content of the current node. 傳回的值取決於節點類型;請參閱參考頁面，如需詳細資訊。The value returned depends on the node type; see the reference page for details.| | 方法 method|取得做為字串的項目或文字節點的內容。Get the content of an element or text node as a string. 此方法會停止處理指示和註解。This method stops on processing instructions and comments.

如需這個方法的特定節點類型的處理方式的詳細資訊，請參閱參考頁面。For details on how this method handles specific node types, see the reference page.| | 和 方法 and methods|取得目前的節點，包括標記，但不含開始和結束標記的所有內容。Get all the content of the current node, including the markup, but excluding start and end tags. 例如，若為：For example, for:

`this`

會傳回： returns:

`this`| ## 將轉換成 CLR 類型Converting to CLR types 您可以使用的成員（下表所列） 的類別讀取 XML 資料，並傳回值，做為通用語言執行平台 (CLR) 型別，而不是字串。You can use the members of the class (listed in the following table) to read XML data and return values as common language runtime (CLR) types instead of strings. 這些成員可讓您取得值，而不必手動剖析，或將字串值轉換為最適合您的程式碼撰寫工作的表示法。These members enable you to get values in the representation that is most appropriate for your coding task without having to manually parse or convert string values. - **ReadElementContentAs**只有元素節點型別上呼叫方法。The **ReadElementContentAs** methods can only be called on element node types. 這些方法無法用於包含項目子系或混合內容的項目。These methods cannot be used on elements that contain child elements or mixed content. 呼叫後， 物件會讀取開始標記、讀取項目內容，然後移動到超過結尾項目標記以後的部分。When called, the object reads the start tag, reads the element content, and then moves past the end element tag. 處理指示及註解會略過，並且實體會展開。Processing instructions and comments are ignored and entities are expanded. - **ReadContentAs**方法讀取的文字內容，目前的讀取器位置，和 XML 資料不需要任何結構描述或資料型別與其建立關聯的資訊時，將文字內容轉換成要求的傳回型別。The **ReadContentAs** methods read the text content at the current reader position, and if the XML data doesn't have any schema or data type information associated with it, convert the text content to the requested return type. 文字、泛空白字元、顯著泛空白字元及 CDATA 區段都是串連的。Text, white space, significant white space and CDATA sections are concatenated. 註解和處理指示會略過，並會自動解析實體參考。Comments and processing instructions are skipped, and entity references are automatically resolved. 類別會使用所定義的規則[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/)建議。The class uses the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://www.w3.org/TR/xmlschema-2/) recommendation. |使用此方法Use this method|傳回這個 CLR 類型To return this CLR type| property. 請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)對應資訊。See [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md) for mapping information.| 如果項目輕鬆無法轉換為 CLR 型別中，但會因為其格式，您可以使用結構描述對應，以確保成功的轉換。If an element can't easily be converted to a CLR type because of its format, you can use a schema mapping to ensure a successful conversion. 下列範例會使用為.xsd 檔轉換`hire-date`項目`xs:date`類型，然後使用方法，以傳回此元素作為物件。The following example uses an .xsd file to Date: 7/8/2003 12:00:00 AM ``` ## 非同步程式設計Asynchronous programming 大部分的方法有非同步對應項目具有"Async"結尾的方法名稱。Most of the methods have asynchronous counterparts that have "Async" at the end of their method names. [!code-vb[System.Xml.XmlReader.Class#5](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.xml.xmlreader.class/vb/module1.vb#5)] ## 安全性考量Security considerations 使用時，請考慮下列類別：Consider the following when working with the class: - 從擲回的例外狀況可能會洩露到您的應用程式的路徑資訊，您可能不想反昇。Exceptions thrown from the can disclose path information that you might not want bubbled up to your app. 您的應用程式必須攔截例外狀況，並適當地處理它們。Your app must catch exceptions and process them appropriately. - 請勿啟用 DTD 處理，如果您擔心阻絕服務問題，或如果您正在處理不受信任的來源。Do not enable DTD processing if you're concerned about denial of service issues or if you're dealing with untrusted sources. 預設為停用 DTD 處理所建立的物件方法。DTD processing is disabled by default for objects created by the method. 如果已啟用 DTD 處理，則可使用 限制 可存取的資源。If you have DTD processing enabled, you can use the to restrict the resources that the can access. 您也可以設計您的應用程式，讓 XML 處理具有記憶體和時間限制。You can also design your app so that the XML processing is memory and time constrained. 比方說，您可以設定逾時限制在您的 ASP.NET 應用程式。For example, you can configure time-out limits in your ASP.NET app. - XML 資料可以包括外部資源的參考，如結構描述檔案。XML data can include references to external resources such as a schema file. 根據預設，使用解析外部資源與不具使用者認證的物件。By default, external resources are resolved by using an object with no user credentials. 您可以透過執行下列其中一項作業，進一步保護它：You can secure this further by doing one of the following: - 藉由將 屬性設為 物件，限制 可以存取的資源。Restrict the resources that the can access by setting the property to an object. - 藉由將 屬性設為 ，來禁止 `null` 開啟外部資源。Do not allow the to open any external resources by setting the property to `null`. - 並驗證旗標物件不預設設定。The and validation flags of an object aren't set by default. 在處理來自不受信任來源的 XML 資料時，這有助於保護 ，防止其遭受以結構描述為基礎的攻擊。This helps to protect the against schema-based attacks when it is processing XML data from an untrusted source. 當設定這些旗標時， 物件的 可用於解析在 的執行個體文件中發現的結構描述位置。When these flags are set, the of the object is used to resolve schema locations encountered in the instance document in the . 如果屬性設定為`null`，結構描述位置不是解析即使和設定驗證旗標。If the property is set to `null`, schema locations aren't resolved even if the and validation flags are set. 驗證期間加入的結構描述會加入新型別，並可變更要驗證之物件的驗證結果。Schemas added during validation add new types and can change the validation outcome of the document being validated. 因此，外部結構描述應僅從受信任的來源解析。As a result, external schemas should only be resolved from trusted sources. 建議您停用驗證高可用性的情況下，針對文件的大部分具有識別條件約束的結構描述中的不受信任、 大型 XML 文件時的旗標。We recommend disabling the flag when validating untrusted, large XML documents in high availability scenarios against a schema that has identity constraints over a large part of the document. 預設會啟用此旗標。This flag is enabled by default. - XML 資料可以包含需要相當長時間來處理的大量屬性、命名空間宣告、巢狀項目等。XML data can contain a large number of attributes, namespace declarations, nested elements and so on that require a substantial amount of time to process. 若要傳送至輸入的大小限制，您可以：To limit the size of the input that is sent to the , you can: - 藉由設定限制的文件大小屬性。Limit the size of the document by setting the property. - 產生自展開實體所設定的字元數目限制屬性。Limit the number of characters that result from expanding entities by setting the property. - 建立自訂`IStream`實作。Create a custom `IStream` implementation for the . - 方法可用來處理大型資料流的資料。The method can be used to handle large streams of data. 此方法每次會讀取較少數量的字元，而不是為整個值配置單一字串。This method reads a small number of characters at a time instead of allocating a single string for the whole value. - 讀取 XML 文件具有大量唯一本機名稱、 命名空間或前置詞時，會發生問題。When reading an XML document with a large number of unique local names, namespaces, or prefixes, a problem can occur. 如果您使用的類別，衍生自，而且您呼叫， ，或每個項目的屬性，傳回的字串會新增至。If you are using a class that derives from , and you call the , , or property for each item, the returned string is added to a . 所持有的集合永遠不會減少的大小，建立字串控制代碼的虛擬記憶體流失。The collection held by the never decreases in size, creating a virtual memory leak of the string handles. 這一個緩和策略是衍生自類別並強制執行最大的大小配額。One mitigation for this is to derive from the class and enforce a maximum size quota. (沒有任何方法可防止使用，或切換配額已滿時)。(There is no way to prevent the use of a , or to switch the when it is full). 另一個的緩和措施是避免使用提到的屬性，改用方法方法這些方法可能; 不傳回字串，並因此避免量問題集合。Another mitigation is to avoid using the properties mentioned and instead use the method with the method where possible; those methods don't return strings and thus avoid the problem of overfilling the collection. - 物件可以包含機密資訊 (如使用者認證)。 objects can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 不受信任的元件可能會使用 物件及其使用者認證，建立 物件來讀取資料。An untrusted component could use the object and its user credentials to create objects to read data. 快取時請小心物件，或傳遞時元件之間的物件。Be careful when caching objects, or when passing the object from one component to another. - 請不要接受來自不受信任來源的支援元件，如 、 及 物件。Do not accept supporting components, such as , , and objects, from an untrusted source. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用非同步 API 來剖析 XML。The following example code shows how to use the asynchronous API to parse XML. remarks.format: ## Remarks 網路上的 XML 文件使用不同的 W3C 標準包含機制進行彙總的資料區塊所組成，並因此會包含來自不同位置的節點。A networked XML document is comprised of chunks of data aggregated using various W3C standard inclusion mechanisms and therefore contains nodes that come from different places. DTD 實體就是一個例子，但這並不限於使用 Dtd。DTD entities are an example of this, but this is not limited to DTDs. 基底 URI 會告訴您這些節點的來源。The base URI tells you where these nodes came from. 是否要傳回的節點沒有基底 URI （例如，它們已從字串中剖析記憶體中），`String.Empty`會傳回。If there is no base URI for the nodes being returned (for example, they were parsed from an in-memory string), `String.Empty` is returned.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 大部分多載包含`settings`接受參數物件。Most of the overloads include a `settings` parameter that accepts an object. 您可以使用這個物件：You can use this object to: - 指定您想要支援哪些功能物件。Specify which features you want supported on the object. - 重複使用物件來建立多個讀取器。Reuse the object to create multiple readers. 您可以使用相同設定來建立具有相同功能的多個讀取器。You can use the same settings to create multiple readers with the same functionality. 或者，您可以修改的設定上執行個體，並建立新的讀取器與一組不同的功能。Or, you can modify the settings on an instance and create a new reader with a different set of features. - 將功能加入現有的 XML 讀取器。Add features to an existing XML reader. 方法可以接受其他 物件。The method can accept another object. 基礎物件可以是使用者定義的讀取器物件，或另一個您想要加入其他功能的執行個體。The underlying object can be a user-defined reader, a object, or another instance that you want to add additional features to. - 充分利用功能，例如更好的一致性檢查及合規性[XML 1.0 （第四版）](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/)建議僅適用於建立的靜態物件方法。Take full advantage of features such as better conformance checking and compliance to the [XML 1.0 (fourth edition)](https://www.w3.org/TR/2006/REC-xml-20060816/) recommendation that are available only on objects created by the static method. > [!NOTE] > 雖然.NET Framework 包含的具體實作類別，例如， ，而類別，建議您建立執行個體使用方法。Although the .NET Framework includes concrete implementations of the class, such as the , , and the classes, we recommend that you create instances by using the method. ## 預設設定Default settings 如果您使用不接受多載物件時，會使用下列的預設讀取器設定：If you use a overload that doesn't accept a object, the following default reader settings are used: |設定Setting|預設Default| |-------------|-------------| ||`true`| ||| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||`false`| ||00| ||00| ||`null`| ||| ||空白的 物件An empty object| || 已啟用 enabled| ||| ||新的 物件。A new object. 從.NET Framework 4.5.2 開始，此設定具有預設值是`null`。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, this setting has a default value of `null`.| ## 設定適用於常見案例Settings for common scenarios 以下是您應該設定的一些典型的 XML 讀取器案例的屬性。Here are the properties you should set for some of the typical XML reader scenarios. |需求Requirement|設定Set| |-----------------|---------| |資料必須是語式正確的 XML 文件。Data must be a well-formed XML document.| 若要。 to .| |資料必須是語式正確的 XML 剖析實體。Data must be a well-formed XML parsed entity.| 若要。 to .| |資料必須根據 DTD 進行驗證。Data must be validated against a DTD.| 至 to
若要。 to .| |資料必須根據 XML 結構描述進行驗證。Data must be validated against an XML schema.| 至 to
若要用來驗證。 to the to use for validation. 請注意，不支援 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 結構描述驗證。Note that doesn't support XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema validation.| |資料必須根據內嵌 XML 結構描述進行驗證。Data must be validated against an inline XML schema.| 至 to
若要。 to .| |型別支援。Type support.| 至 to
若要使用。 to the to use.| 不支援 XML 資料精簡 (XDR) 結構描述驗證。 doesn't support XML-Data Reduced (XDR) schema validation. ## 非同步程式設計Asynchronous programming 在同步模式中，方法會讀取檔案、 資料流或文字讀取器的緩衝區中的第一個區塊的資料。In synchronous mode, the method reads the first chunk of data from the buffer of the file, stream, or text reader. 如果 I/O 作業失敗，這可能會擲回例外狀況。This may throw an exception if an I/O operation fails. 在非同步模式中，第一項 I/O 作業發生在讀取作業，因此讀取的作業發生時，會擲回例外狀況發生。In asynchronous mode, the first I/O operation occurs with a read operation, so exceptions that arise will be thrown when the read operation occurs. ## 安全性考量Security considerations 根據預設，使用使用沒有使用者認證，若要開啟資源的物件。By default, the uses an object with no user credentials to open resources. 這表示根據預設，XML 讀取器可以存取並不需要認證的任何位置。This means that, by default, the XML reader can access any location that doesn't require credentials. 使用屬性，來控制資源的存取權：Use the property to control access to resources: - 設定至物件，以限制 XML 讀取器可以存取的資源。Set to an object to restrict the resources that the XML reader can access. -或--or- - 設定至`null`以防止開啟的任何外部資源的 XML 讀取器。Set to `null` to prevent the XML reader from opening any external resources. ## Examples 這個範例會建立 XML 讀取器會去除不顯著泛空白字元、 去除註解，並執行片段層級的一致性檢查。This example creates an XML reader that strips insignificant white space, strips comments, and performs fragment-level conformance checking. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#11](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#11)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#11](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#11)] 下列範例會使用具有預設認證來存取檔案。The following example uses an with default credentials to access a file. [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#1)] [!code-cpp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CPP/XmlReaderSettings.cctor.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/CS/factory_rdr_cctor2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderSettings.cctor#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderSettings.cctor/VB/factory_rdr_cctor2.vb#2)] 下列程式碼包裝在另一個讀取器讀取器執行個體。The following code wraps a reader instance within another reader. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#13)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#13)] 此範例中鏈結讀取器以加入 DTD 和 XML 結構描述驗證。This example chains readers to add DTD and XML schema validation. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.Create#12](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/CS/XmlReader_Create.cs#12)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.Create#12](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.Create/VB/XmlReader_Create.vb#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件使用預設設定用來建立讀取器。An object with default settings is used to create the reader. 如果您想要指定要建立的讀取器上支援的功能，使用採用的多載物件做為其引數，其中，並傳入具有正確的設定物件。If you wish to specify the features to support on the created reader, use the overload that takes an object as one of its arguments, and pass in an object with the correct settings. 預設值以不含認證用來存取任何外部的資源，例如文件類型定義 (DTD)、 實體、 結構描述等等。A default with no credentials is used to access any external resources such as a document type definition (DTD), entities, schemas, and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從.NET Framework 4.5.2，沒有預設值開始提供。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, no default is provided. 如果您的解決方案以目標為.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更新版本，指定使用屬性。If your solution targets the .NET Framework 4.5.2 or later versions, specify an using the property. 如果在需要驗證的網路資源位於外部的資源，請指定具有必要的認證使用屬性。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, specify an with the necessary credentials using the property. 建立物件展開實體參考，並執行新行字元的 XML 正規化。The created object expands entity references and performs XML normalization of new line characters. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件，以讀取來自。The following example creates an object that reads from a . remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設以不含認證用來存取任何外部的資源，例如文件類型定義 (DTD)、 實體、 結構描述等等。By default an with no credentials is used to access any external resources such as a document type definition (DTD), entities, schemas, and so on. > [!IMPORTANT] > 從.NET Framework 4.5.2，沒有預設值開始提供。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, no default is provided. 如果您的解決方案以目標為.NET Framework 4.5.2 或更新版本，指定使用屬性。If your solution targets the .NET Framework 4.5.2 or later versions, specify an using the property. 如果在需要驗證的網路資源位於外部的資源，請使用屬性來指定具有必要認證。If the external resource is located on a network resource that requires authentication, use the property to specify an with the necessary credentials. > [!IMPORTANT] > 您可以使用其中一種下列方法來控制哪些資源可以存取：You can use one of the following methods to control which resources the can access: > > - 藉由將 屬性設為 物件，限制 可以存取的資源。Restrict the resources that the can access by setting the property to an object. > > -或--or- > > - 藉由將 屬性設為 ，來禁止 `null` 開啟外部資源。Do not allow the to open any external resources by setting the property to `null`. 建立物件展開實體參考，並執行新行字元的 XML 正規化。The created object expands entity references and performs XML normalization of new line characters. ## Examples 下列範例會建立讀取 XML 片段的物件。The following example creates an object that reads an XML fragment. remarks.format: ## Remarks 下表列出具有傳回值的節點類型。The following table lists node types that have a value to return. |節點類型Node Type|值Value| |---------------|-----------| |`Attribute`|屬性的值。The value of the attribute.| |`CDATA`|CDATA 區段的內容。The content of the CDATA section.| |`Comment`|註解的內容。The content of the comment.| |`DocumentType`|內部子集。The internal subset.| |`ProcessingInstruction`|全部內容 (目標除外)。The entire content, excluding the target.| |`SignificantWhitespace`|在混合內容模型中標記間的泛空白字元。The white space between markup in a mixed content model.| |`Text`|文字節點的內容。The content of the text node.| |`Whitespace`|標記之間的泛空白字元。The white space between markup.| |`XmlDeclaration`|宣告的內容。The content of the declaration.| ## Examples 請參閱(在`XmlTextReader`類別) 如需使用此方法的範例。See (in the `XmlTextReader` class) for a sample using this method.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此屬性可讓您判斷下列各項目之間的差異：This property enables you to determine the difference between the following: `` (`IsEmptyElement`是`true`)。`` (`IsEmptyElement` is `true`). `` (`IsEmptyElement`是`false`，不過是空的項目內容)。`` (`IsEmptyElement` is `false`, although element content is empty). 對應`EndElement`節點並不會產生空的項目。A corresponding `EndElement` node is not generated for empty elements. 如果預設的內容已加入的項目，因為結構描述的驗證，所以`IsEmptyElement`仍會傳回`true`。If default content has been added to an element due to schema validation, `IsEmptyElement` still returns `true`. 它具有在項目具有預設值並無任何影響。It has no bearing on whether or not the element has a default value. 換句話說，`IsEmptyElement`只會報告是否在來源文件中的項目具有結尾項目標記。In other words, `IsEmptyElement` simply reports whether or not the element in the source document had an end element tag. ## Examples 下列範例會顯示每個項目的文字內容。The following example displays the text content of each element. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#10](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#10)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#10](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#10)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`elems.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `elems.xml`, as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks 從傳回的所有節點和屬性名稱不可部分完成的使用`NameTable`。All node and attribute names returned from are atomized using the `NameTable`. 相同的名稱傳回多次時 (例如`Customer`)，然後相同`String`物件就會傳回該名稱。When the same name is returned multiple times (for example, `Customer`), then the same `String` object will be returned for that name. 這項功能可讓您撰寫有效率的程式碼，進行物件比較，對這些字串，而不是昂貴的字串比較。This makes it possible for you to write efficient code that does object comparisons on these strings instead of expensive string comparisons.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當這是第一次建立並初始化，沒有可用的資訊。When an is first created and initialized, there is no information available. 您必須呼叫讀取的第一個節點。You must call to read the first node. 方法會設定狀態的 XML 讀取器，來起始並透過 XML 檔案以循序方式移動，直到它到達的檔案，此時方法會傳回值的結尾`false`。The method sets the state of the XML reader to initiate and moves through the XML file sequentially until it reaches the end of the file, at which point the method returns a value of `false`. 這個方法需要從資料流至少四個位元組，才能開始剖析。This method requires at least four bytes from the data stream in order to begin parsing. 如果傳回少於四個位元組，而且資料流中沒有詳細資料，此方法會傳回`false`。If fewer than four bytes are returned and there is no more data in the stream, the method returns `false`. 如果資料流中有更多資料，方法會封鎖直到接收第四個位元組的剖析。If there is more data in the stream, the method will block parsing until receipt of the fourth byte. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會讀取 XML 檔案，並顯示每個節點。The following example reads an XML file and displays each of the nodes. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#8](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#8)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#8](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#8)] 此範例會使用`items.xml`檔案。The sample uses the `items.xml` file. remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個方法之後呼叫閱讀的文字或實體參考節點的屬性值所組成。Use this method after calling to read through the text or entity reference nodes that make up the attribute value. 屬性值的節點是屬性節點的深度加一，它會自動遞增和遞減 1 當您逐步執行和跳離一般實體參考。The of the attribute value nodes is one plus the depth of the attribute node; it increments and decrements by one when you step into and out of general entity references.

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會讀取目前的讀取器位置上的文字內容，並將它轉換成要求的傳回型別。This method reads the text content at the current reader position and converts it to the requested return type. 文字、泛空白字元、顯著泛空白字元及 CDATA 區段都是串連的。Text, white space, significant white space and CDATA sections are concatenated. 註解和處理指示會略過，並且實體參考會自動進行解析。Comments and processing instructions are skipped and entity references are automatically resolved. 這個方法用來讀取、 轉換，如有必要，並傳回從目前節點的不可部份完成值的項目內容。This method is used to read, convert if necessary, and return atomic value items from the current node content. 如果輸入型別是目前的節點包含目前節點的值的目標型別執行個體之類型的有效對應會傳回。If the input type is a valid mappings for the type of the current node then an instance of the target type containing the value of the current node is returned. 請參閱 < 備註 > 一節referencepage 如需預設對應的清單。See the Remarks section in the referencepage for a list of the default mappings. 例如，如果您有下列的 XML 文字：For example, if you had the following XML text: ```xml 123 456 ``` 如果資料型別和字串陣列，提供給從根據有效的 CLR 型別對應的清單的字串轉換方法呼叫，則整數值。If the data is typed and a string array is supplied to the method call, then the integer values are converted from strings according to the list of valid CLR type mappings. 如果資料是不具型別和字串陣列，提供給方法呼叫，將內容會剖析為個別的字串。If the data is untyped and a string array is supplied to the method call, then the content is parsed into separate strings. 包含兩個字串的陣列會傳回值為"123"和"456 」。An array containing two strings is returned with the values "123" and "456". 從內容，不會保留空間。The spaces are not preserved from the content. 通常在讀取不具類型的資料內容會剖析根據提供的型別。In general when reading untyped data the content is parsed according to the supplied type. 例如，如果整數陣列提供給方法呼叫，則字串會剖析為整數的陣列{123,456}。For example, if an integer array is supplied to the method call then the string is parsed into an array of integers {123,456}. 在下列範例中的 XML 文字是不以空格分隔In the following example the XML text is not separated by spaces ```xml 123456789 ``` 如果內容是不具型別和字串陣列，提供給方法然後呼叫包含其中一個值"123456789"會傳回串連的字串的陣列。If the content is untyped and a string array is supplied to the method call then an array containing one concatenated string is returned with the value "123456789". 下表描述這個方法處理每個節點類型的方式。The following table describes how this method treats each node type. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|傳回值Return value|讀取器行為Reader behavior| |-----------------|------------------|---------------------| |`Text`

`CDATA`

`Whitespace`

`SignificantWhitespace`

`EntityReference`

`EndEntity`|文字、CDATA、泛空白字元及顯著泛空白字元節點的串連內容會轉換為要求的型別。Concatenated content of text, CDATA, white space and significant white space nodes converted to the requested type.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`Attribute`|與呼叫相同`XmlConvert.ToXxx`屬性值。Same as calling `XmlConvert.ToXxx` on the attribute value.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Comment`

`ProcessingInstruction`|忽略處理指示 (PI) 或註解，並讀取 PI 或註解後面的串連文字內容。Ignores the processing instruction (PI) or comment and reads the concatenated text content that follows the PI or comment.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`EndElement`|空字串。An empty string.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Element`

`XmlDeclaration`

`None`

`Document`

`DocumentType`

`Notation`

`Entity`

`DocumentFragment`|擲回 。An is thrown.|未定義 (但讀取器通常會保持在目前位置)。Undefined, although typically the reader remains in the current position.| 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面並[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來傳回色彩項目的內容到字串物件的陣列。The following example uses the method to return the contents of the colors element into an array of string objects. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/CS/readContentAs.cs#2)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/VB/readContentAs.vb#2)] 該範例使用 `dataFile_2.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the `dataFile_2.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/XML/dataFile_2.xml#3)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會串流處理內容、 解碼`Base64`內容，並傳回已解碼二進位位元組 (例如，內嵌`Base64`編碼的 GIF 影像) 到緩衝區。This method streams the content, decodes the `Base64` content, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `Base64` encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 可以連續呼叫這個方法來讀取內嵌文字的大量資料流。This method can be called successively to read large streams of embedded text. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 第一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119). > [!NOTE] > 您不應該存取的任何讀取器屬性呼叫之間方法，這個方法傳回值直到`0`。You should not access any of the reader properties between calls to the method until the method returns the value `0`. 這個方法有下列行為：This method has the following behavior: - 傳回值`0`當它到達它正在操作的位元組資料流的結尾。 returns the value `0` when it has reached the end of the byte stream it was operating on. 讀取器定位於第一個非內容節點上。The reader is positioned on the first non-content node. - 如果您尋求更少，或確切數目，超過會留在讀取器會保留在其目前位置的資料流位元組數目。If you ask for fewer, or the exact number of, bytes than are left in the stream the reader remains in its current position. - 不支援下列的 XML 節點類型： `Element`， `XmlDeclaration`， `None`， `Document`， `DocumentType`， `Notation`， `Entity`， `DocumentFragment`。 is not supported on the following XML node types: `Element`, `XmlDeclaration`, `None`, `Document`, `DocumentType`, `Notation`, `Entity`, `DocumentFragment`. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會串連文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元和 CDATA 區段，並略過任何註解或處理指示。This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions. 會自動解析實體參考。Entity references are automatically resolved. 如果內容的型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器傳回 unboxed物件。If the content is typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader returns an unboxed object. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成物件所定義的規則根據[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader attempts to convert it to a object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 下表描述這個方法處理每個節點類型的方式。The following table describes how this method treats each node type. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|傳回值Return value|讀取器行為Reader behavior| |-----------------|------------------|---------------------| |`Text`

`CDATA`

`Whitespace`

`SignificantWhitespace`

`EntityReference`

`EndEntity`|文字、CDATA、泛空白字元及顯著泛空白字元節點的串連內容會轉換為要求的型別。Concatenated content of text, CDATA, white space and significant white space nodes converted to the requested type.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`Attribute`|與呼叫相同`XmlConvert.ToXxx`屬性值。Same as calling `XmlConvert.ToXxx` on the attribute value.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Comment`

`ProcessingInstruction`|忽略處理指示 (PI) 或註解，並讀取 PI 或註解後面的串連文字內容。Ignores the processing instruction (PI) or comment and reads the concatenated text content that follows the PI or comment.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`EndElement`|空字串。An empty string.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Element`

`XmlDeclaration`

`None`

`Document`

`DocumentType`

`Notation`

`Entity`

`DocumentFragment`|擲回 。An is thrown.|未定義 (但讀取器通常會保持在目前位置)。Undefined, although typically the reader remains in the current position.| 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < 參考頁面並[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。For more information, see the reference page and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法來讀取以 B 屬性`oolean`值。The following example uses the method to read the attribute as a B`oolean` value. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/CS/readContentAs.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/VB/readContentAs.vb#1)] 該範例使用 `dataFile_2.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the `dataFile_2.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XmlReader.ReadContentAs#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadContentAs/XML/dataFile_2.xml#3)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會串連文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元和 CDATA 區段，並略過任何註解或處理指示。This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions. 會自動解析實體參考。Entity references are automatically resolved. 如果內容的型別`xsd:integer`，讀取器傳回的 unboxed 的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。If the content is typed `xsd:integer`, the reader returns an unboxed 32-bit signed integer. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:integer`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成 32 位元帶正負號的整數，根據所定義的規則[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:integer`, the reader attempts to convert it to a 32-bit signed integer according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 下表描述這個方法處理每個節點類型的方式。The following table describes how this method treats each node type. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|傳回值Return value|讀取器行為Reader behavior| |-----------------|------------------|---------------------| |`Text`

`CDATA`

`Whitespace`

`SignificantWhitespace`

`EntityReference`

`EndEntity`|文字、CDATA、泛空白字元及顯著泛空白字元節點的串連內容會轉換為要求的型別。Concatenated content of text, CDATA, white space and significant white space nodes converted to the requested type.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`Attribute`|與呼叫相同`XmlConvert.ToXxx`屬性值。Same as calling `XmlConvert.ToXxx` on the attribute value.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Comment`

`ProcessingInstruction`|忽略處理指示 (PI) 或註解，並讀取 PI 或註解後面的串連文字內容。Ignores the processing instruction (PI) or comment and reads the concatenated text content that follows the PI or comment.|移至下一個開始項目或結尾項目標記。Moves to the next start element or end element tag. 實體參考會自動展開。Entity references are automatically expanded.| |`EndElement`|空字串。An empty string.|讀取器會保持在目前位置。The reader remains in the current position.| |`Element`

remarks.format:
## Remarks 這個方法會串連文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元和 CDATA 區段，並略過任何註解或處理指示。This method concatenates text, white space, significant white space, and CDATA sections, and skips any comments or processing instructions. 會自動解析實體參考。Entity references are automatically resolved. 如果內容的類型，讀取器會傳回所指定的最適當類型的 boxed 的 CLR屬性。If the content is typed, the reader returns a boxed CLR of the most appropriate type, specified by the property. 如果內容是清單型別，讀取器就會傳回適當的型別之 boxed 物件的陣列。If the content is a list type, the reader returns an array of boxed objects of the appropriate type. > [!NOTE] > 如果剖析內容時，發生驗證錯誤而讀取器所建立的物件方法，讀取器會傳回字串形式的內容。If a validation error occurs while parsing the content and the reader is an object created by the method, the reader returns the content as a string. 亦即當發生驗證錯誤或警告，內容會被視為不具型別。In other words when a validation error or warning occurs, the content is considered to be untyped. 如果內容不具型別，則讀取器會以字串形式傳回內容。If the content is not typed, the reader returns the content as a string. 下表描述這個方法處理每個節點類型的方式。The following table describes how this method treats each node type. |XmlNodeTypeXmlNodeType|傳回值Return value|讀取器行為Reader behavior| |-----------------|------------------|---------------------| |`Text`

`CDATA`

`SignificantWhitespace`

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法讀取項目內容中，使用將其解碼`Base64`編碼，並傳回已解碼二進位位元組 (例如，內嵌`Base64`-編碼的 GIF 影像) 到緩衝區。This method reads the element content, decodes it using `Base64` encoding, and returns the decoded binary bytes (for example, an inline `Base64`-encoded GIF image) into the buffer. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 RFC 1521"MIME （多用途網際網路郵件延伸標準） 第一個： 機制來指定，並描述網際網路訊息內文的格式 」。For more information, see RFC 1521, "MIME (Multipurpose Internet Mail Extensions) Part One: Mechanisms for Specifying and Describing the Format of Internet Message Bodies". 您可以取得從 Rfc[註解的網站要求](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119)。You can obtain RFCs from the [Request for Comments Web site](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=37119). 只能讀取簡單內容項目。 can only read simple-content elements. 元素可以包含文字、 泛空白字元、 顯著泛空白字元、 CDATA 區段中，註解和處理指示。The element can contain text, white space, significant white space, CDATA sections, comments and processing instructions. 它也可以包含實體參考，會自動展開。It can also contain entity references, which are automatically expanded. 項目不能有子項目。The element cannot have child elements. 此方式非常類似於方法，但它只能在項目節點型別上呼叫。This method is very similar to the method except that it can only be called on element node types. 如果`count`值高於在文件中的位元組數目是否等於在文件中的位元組數目或讀取文件中所有剩餘的位元組，並傳回讀取的位元組數目。If the `count` value is higher than the number of bytes in the document, or if it is equal to the number of bytes in the document, the reads all the remaining bytes in the document and returns the number of bytes read. 下一步方法呼叫會傳回零，並將讀取器移至節點下列`EndElement`。The next method call returns a zero and moves the reader to the node following the `EndElement`. 如果您呼叫會使用所有的項目內容之前，讀取器可能彷彿已在使用第一次的內容，然後呼叫方法。If you call before all of the element content is consumed, the reader may behave as if the first content was consumed and then the method was called. 這表示讀取器會讀取所有文字，直到遇到結束的項目。This means that the reader will read all the text until the end element is encountered. 它接著讀取結束標記節點，讀取下一個節點，並接著將本身置於下一個後續節點。It will then read the end tag node, read the next node, and then position itself on the next subsequent node. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會讀取內嵌`Base64`編碼的影像。The following example reads an inline `Base64` encoded image. `Base64`資料內嵌在``項目。The `Base64` data is embedded within the `` element. A用來建立新的二進位資料檔案。A is used to create a new binary data file. summary.span: 以 物件的形式，讀取目前項目並傳回內容。

span.span: Reads the current element and returns the contents as a object.

returns.span: 物件形式的項目內容。

span.span: The element content as a object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果項目內容的型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器傳回 unboxed物件。If the element content is typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader returns an unboxed object. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成物件所定義的規則根據[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader attempts to convert it to a object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果內容的型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器傳回 unboxed物件。If the content is typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader returns an unboxed object. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:boolean`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成物件所定義的規則根據[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:boolean`, the reader attempts to convert it to a object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果內容的型別`xsd:dateTime`，讀取器傳回 unboxed物件。If the content is typed `xsd:dateTime`, the reader returns an unboxed object. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:dateTime`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成物件所定義的規則根據[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:dateTime`, the reader attempts to convert it to a object according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. > [!NOTE] > 當內容的型別為 時，無法依賴 `xsd:gMonthDay` 值。You cannot rely on the value when the content is typed as `xsd:gMonthDay`. 一律設定值在此例為 1904年。 always sets the value to 1904 in this case. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. ## Examples 下列範例會使用方法，以讀取內容`date`項目。The following example uses the method to read the content of the `date` element. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/CS/readElementContentAs.cs#4)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/VB/readElementContentAs.vb#4)] 該範例使用 `dataFile.xml` 檔案做為輸入。The example uses the `dataFile.xml` file as input. remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果內容的型別`xsd:double`，讀取器傳回的雙精確度浮點數。If the content is typed `xsd:double`, the reader returns a double-precision floating-point number. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:double`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換為雙精確度浮點數，根據所定義的規則[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:double`, the reader attempts to convert it to a double-precision floating-point number according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page. ## Examples 下列範例會使用此方法傳回的項目內容，做為雙精確度浮點數。The following example uses the method to return the element content as a double-precision floating-point number. span.span: Checks that the specified local name and namespace URI matches that of the current element, then reads the current element and returns the contents as a double-precision floating-point number.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果內容的型別`xsd:double`，讀取器傳回的雙精確度浮點數。If the content is typed `xsd:double`, the reader returns a double-precision floating-point number. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:double`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換為雙精確度浮點數，根據所定義的規則[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:double`, the reader attempts to convert it to a double-precision floating-point number according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如果內容的型別`xsd:integer`，讀取器傳回的 unboxed 的 32 位元帶正負號的整數。If the content is typed `xsd:integer`, the reader returns an unboxed 32-bit signed integer. 如果內容不具型別`xsd:integer`，讀取器會嘗試將它轉換成 32 位元帶正負號的整數，根據所定義的規則[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。If the content is not typed `xsd:integer`, the reader attempts to convert it to a 32-bit signed integer according to the rules defined by the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 參考頁面的＜備註＞一節。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會讀取開始標記，元素的內容，並移動讀取超過結尾項目標記。This method reads the start tag, the contents of the element, and moves the reader past the end element tag. 它會展開實體，並忽略處理指示與註解。It expands entities and ignores processing instructions and comments. 項目只能包含簡單內容。The element can only contain simple content. 也就是說，它不能有子項目。That is, it cannot have child elements. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱的 < 備註 > 一節參考頁面並[W3C XML 結構描述第 2 部分： 資料型別](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871)建議。For more information, see the Remarks section of the reference page and the [W3C XML Schema Part 2: Datatypes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkId=4871) recommendation. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會使用此方法來讀取的內容`price`節點。The following example uses the method to read the content of the `price` node. 讀取器會使用結構描述中的資訊，以將內容對應至正確的資料類型。The reader uses the information in the schema to map the content to the correct data type. [!code-csharp[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#6](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/CS/readElementContentAs.cs#6)] [!code-vb[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#6](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/VB/readElementContentAs.vb#6)] 此範例會使用下列兩個檔案，做為輸入。The example uses the following two files as input. `item.xml` [!code-xml[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#11](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/XML/item.xml#11)] `item.xsd` [!code-xml[XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs#12](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReader.ReadElementContentAs/XML/item.xsd#12)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以呼叫只能在項目節點上。 can be called only on element nodes. 已讀取整個子樹狀目錄中，呼叫方法會傳回`false`。When the entire sub-tree has been read, calls to the method returns `false`. 當新的 XML 讀取器已關閉，位於原始 readeris`EndElement`子樹狀結構的節點。When the new XML reader has been closed, the original readeris positioned on the `EndElement` node of the sub-tree. 因此，如果您呼叫book 項目樹狀子目錄已讀取] 和 [新的 XML 讀取器後的開始標記上的方法已關閉，原始的 XML 讀取器定位於結束標記的書籍項目上。Thus, if you called the method on the start tag of the book element, after the sub-tree has been read and the new XML reader has been closed, the original XML reader is positioned on the end tag of the book element. 在關閉新讀取器之前，不應在原始讀取器上執行任何作業。You should not perform any operations on the original reader until the new reader has been closed. 此動作不受支援，並會導致無法預期的行為。This action is not supported and can result in unpredictable behavior. > [!NOTE] > 方法不適用於 creatingcopies，您可以使用獨立的 XML 資料。The method isn't intended for creatingcopies of the XML data that you can work with independently. 它的專為建立的 XML 項目周圍的界限。It's designedto create a boundary around an XML element. 如果您想要將資料傳遞至另一個元件進行處理，而您想要限制您的元件可以存取的資料中有多少，這非常有用。This is useful if you want to pass data to another component for processing and you wish to limit how much of your data the component can access. 當您傳遞所傳回的 XML 讀取器另一個應用程式，應用程式的方法可以存取只有該 XML 項目，不是整個 XML 文件。When you pass an XML reader returned by the method to another application, the application can access only that XML element, not the entire XML document. ## Examples 下列範例會示範如何使用 方法。The following example shows how to use the method. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#13](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#13)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#13](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#13)] 您可以使用下列 XML 資料來執行本主題中的範例：Use the following XML data to run the examples in this topic: ```xml A Brief History of Time Principle Of Relativity Victory of Reason The Unicorn that did not Fail Rational Ontology The Meaning of Pizza ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是設定執行的功能上相當`following::name`從目前節點的 XPath 運算式。This method is functionally equivalent executing the `following::name` XPath expression from the current node. 它提供快速的方式來尋找 XML 文件中的具名項目。It provides a quick way to find a named element in the XML document. 將讀取器前移至下一步 的下列項目符合指定的名稱，並傳回`true`如果找到相符的項目。It advances the reader to the next following element that matches the specified name and returns `true` if a matching element is found. 使用下列範例中，讀取器會讀取指定之項目的第一個執行個體同時向前讀取。Using the example below, the reader would read to the first instance of the specified element while reading forward. ```xml ``` ```csharp XmlTextReader reader = newXmlTextReader("sample.xml"); reader.ReadToFollowing("item"); ``` 可以在所有節點類型上呼叫這個方法。This method can be called on all node types.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可讓您的非常大型資料流處理方式，也就是在 XML 文件中內嵌的文字資料流讀取一次而不是整個值配置單一字串的字元數少。This method enables reading of very large streams of text embedded in an XML document in a streaming fashion, that is, a small number of characters at a time instead of allocating a single string for the whole value. 可以呼叫這個方法，其值的任何節點上 (是`true`)，但實際的節點值只會進行串流處理時呼叫的文字、 泛空白字元和顯著泛空白字元節點。This method can be called on any node that has a value ( is `true`), however actual streaming of the node value only occurs when called on a text, white space and significant white space nodes. 其他節點型別值會快取，包括屬性和 CDATA 節點。Other node type values are cached, including attributes and CDATA nodes. 這個方法傳回的內容屬性並不會移動。This method returns only the content of the property and does not move the . 這個方法會讀取指定的字元數 (`count`) 的節點值的字元緩衝區 (`buffer`) 中的指定位移 (`index`)，並傳回寫入緩衝區的字元數。This method reads the specified number of characters (`count`) of the node value into a character buffer (`buffer`) at a specified offset (`index`) and returns the number of characters written to the buffer. 它會傳回`0`當它已達到此值的結尾。It returns the `0` when it has reached the end of the value. 它無法閱讀值重新啟動。It cannot be restarted to read through the value again. 呼叫之間屬性進行任何變更，除了屬性。In between calls to the properties do no change except for the property. 當存取屬性時它可能會傳回部分的值 (尚未所傳回的字元) 或完整的值，視實作而定。When the property is accessed it may either return a partial value (with characters not yet returned by ) or a full value depending on the implementation. 所有中的實作命名空間傳回的部分值屬性實作。All the implementations in the namespace return a partial value for the property implementation. 任何讀取方法呼叫之間呼叫。Any Read method can be called in between calls to . 如果發生這種情況移至下一個中的資料流和尚不傳回任何字元會略過。If this occurs, the moves to the next in the stream and any characters not yet returned are skipped. 可能有案例當傳回少於所要求的字元數目。There may be a case when returns less than the requested number of characters. 例如，如果您有 200 個字元長的值將 surrogate 字組 127 和 128 的位置，而且您呼叫128 個字元的緩衝區中，使用方法呼叫會傳回 127 個字元，而不是要求 128。For example, if you had a 200-character long value with a surrogate pair at positions 127 and 128 and you called with a 128-character buffer, the method call would return 127 characters instead of the requested 128. Surrogate 字組則會傳回在下一個呼叫。The surrogate pair would then be returned in the next call. 在此情況下，未傳回要求的 128 個字元，因為這樣做，可能會導致結尾的緩衝區不完整的 surrogate 字組。In this case, did not return the requested 128 characters because doing so would have resulted in an incomplete surrogate pair at the end of the buffer. 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see .

returns.span: 讀入緩衝區的字元數目。

span.span: The number of characters read into the buffer.

returns.span: 當不再有文字內容時，會傳回零的值。

span.span: The value zero is returned when there is no more text content.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這是非同步的，使用相同的功能。This is the asynchronous version of , with the same functionality. 若要使用此方法，您必須設定旗標設為`true`。To use this method, you must set the flag to `true`.

exception.span: 在未將 旗標設為 的情況下呼叫了 非同步方法。

span.span: An asynchronous method was called without setting the flag to .

exception.span: 在此情況下，會擲回 與「如果您想要使用非同步方法，請將 XmlReaderSettings.Async 設為 true」的訊息。

span.span: In this case, is thrown with the message "Set XmlReaderSettings.Async to true if you want to use Async Methods."

summary.span: 當在衍生類別中覆寫時，會解析實體參考節點。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, resolves the entity reference for nodes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果讀取器置於`EntityReference`節點 (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`)，如果之後的呼叫此方法中，實體取代的文字會剖析。If the reader is positioned on an `EntityReference` node (`XmlNodeType.EntityReference`), if is called after calling this method, the entity replacement text is parsed. 實體取代的文字完成時，`EndEntity`節點會傳回關閉的實體參考的範圍。When the entity replacement text is finished, an `EndEntity` node is returned to close the entity reference scope. > [!NOTE] > 之後呼叫這個方法，如果實體是組件的屬性值，您必須呼叫逐步執行至實體。After calling this method, if the entity is part of an attribute value, you must call to step into the entity.

exception.span: 在先前的非同步作業完成前呼叫了 方法。

span.span: An method was called before a previous asynchronous operation finished.

exception.span: 在此情況下，會擲回 與「非同步作業已經在進行中」的訊息。

span.span: In this case, is thrown with the message "An asynchronous operation is already in progress."

summary.span: 取得在結構描述驗證之後已指派給目前節點的結構描述資訊。

span.span: Gets the schema information that has been assigned to the current node as a result of schema validation.

value.span: 物件，包含目前節點的結構描述資訊。

span.span: An object containing the schema information for the current node.

value.span: 可以在項目、屬性或具有非 null (具型別值) 之文字節點上設定結構描述資訊。

span.span: Schema information can be set on elements, attributes, or on text nodes with a non-null (typed values).

value.span: 如果目前節點不屬於上述其中一個節點型別，或 執行個體不會報告結構描述資訊，則這個屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If the current node is not one of the above node types, or if the instance does not report schema information, this property returns .

value.span: 如果這個屬性是從 或 物件呼叫的，則這個屬性一定會傳回 。

span.span: If this property is called from an or an object, this property always returns .

value.span: 這些 實作不會透過 屬性公開結構描述資訊。

span.span: These implementations do not expose schema information through the property.

para.span: 如果您需要取得項目的後結構描述驗證資訊集 (PSVI)，請將讀取器置於項目的結束標記，而非開始標記。

span.span: If you have to get the post-schema-validation information set (PSVI) for an element, position the reader on the end tag of the element, rather than on the start tag.

para.span: 您可以透過讀取器的 屬性取得 PSVI。

span.span: You get the PSVI through the property of a reader.

para.span: 如果驗證讀取器是透過將 並將 屬性設定為 所建立，則該讀取器必須置於項目的結束標記，才會具有項目的完整 PSVI。

span.span: The validating reader that is created through with the property set to has complete PSVI for an element only when the reader is positioned on the end tag of an element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 介面會公開的後結構描述驗證 Infoset (PSVI) 相關聯的 XML 節點的子集。The interface exposes a subset of the Post Schema Validation Infoset (PSVI) associated with an XML node.

summary.span: 取得 物件，用於建立這個 執行個體。

span.span: Gets the object used to create this instance.

value.span: 物件，用於建立這個讀取器執行個體。

span.span: The object used to create this reader instance.

value.span: 如果未使用 方法建立這個讀取器，則這個屬性會傳回 。

span.span: If this reader was not created using the method, this property returns .

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 物件可以包含機密資訊，例如使用者認證。The object can contain sensitive information such as user credentials. 應用程式必須非常小心，當快取此物件，或將它傳遞到另一個元件。Applications must be careful when caching this object or passing it to another component. 類別用來指定要建立的讀取器執行個體上支援的功能集。The class is used to specify the set of features to support on the created reader instance. 無法修改這個屬性所傳回的物件。The object returned by this property cannot be modified. 任何嘗試變更個別的設定會造成擲回例外狀況。Any attempt to change individual settings results in an exception being thrown.

summary.span: 略過目前節點的子節點。

span.span: Skips the children of the current node.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在下列 XML 程式碼中輸入 是否讀取器位於``節點，或其任意屬性，呼叫`Skip`位置的讀取器``節點。In the following XML input if the reader is positioned on the `` node or any of its attributes, calling `Skip` positions the reader to the `` node. 如果讀取器定位於分葉節點上已 (例如``節點或文字節點`abc`)，則呼叫`Skip`等同於呼叫。If the reader is positioned on a leaf node already (such as the `` node or the text node `abc`), calling `Skip` is the same as calling . ```xml abc ... ``` 這個方法會檢查語式正確的 XML。This method checks for well-formed XML. 如果讀取器，這個方法也會驗證已略過的內容。If the reader is an , this method also validates the skipped content. `XmlReader`實作會判定是否`Skip`方法會展開外部實體。The `XmlReader` implementation determines whether or not the `Skip` method will expand external entities. 下表描述各種類型是否會展開外部的實體`XmlReader`物件。The following table describes whether the external entities are expanded for the various types of `XmlReader` objects. |XmlReader 的型別Type of XmlReader|展開外部的實體Expands external entities| |-----------------------|-------------------------------| ||否。No.| | 所建立的執行個體讀取的文字資料的方法。 instance created by the method that is reading text data.|否。No.| | 所建立的執行個體讀取二進位資料的方法。 instance created by the method that is reading binary data.|不適用。Not applicable.| |結構描述，驗證所建立的執行個體方法。A schema validating instance created by the method.|可以。Yes.| ||可以。Yes.| | 所傳回的執行個體物件。 instance returned by a object.|不適用。Not applicable.| ||否。No.| | 包裝另一個執行個體執行個體。 instance wrapped around another instance.|取決於基礎實作。Depends on the implementation of the underlying . (`Skip`方法的基礎稱為)。(The `Skip` method on the underlying is called).| 這個方法的非同步版本，請參閱。For the asynchronous version of this method, see . ## Examples 下列範例會剖析 XML 檔案的第二個書籍節點上啟動。The following example parses an XML file starting on the second book node. [!code-csharp[XmlReaderBasic#14](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/CS/XmlReader_Basic.cs#14)] [!code-vb[XmlReaderBasic#14](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlReaderBasic/VB/xmlreader_basic.vb#14)] 此範例會使用該檔案，`2books.xml`作為輸入。The example uses the file, `2books.xml`, as input. [!code-xml[XML_Core_Files#7](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XML_Core_Files/XML/2books.xml#7)]

summary.span: 取得目前節點的 Common Language Runtime (CLR) 類型。

span.span: Gets The Common Language Runtime (CLR) type for the current node.

value.span: CLR 類型，對應至節點的具類型值。

span.span: The CLR type that corresponds to the typed value of the node.

value.span: 預設值為 。

span.span: The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 請參閱[System.Xml 類別中的型別支援](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md)如需預設對應的清單。See [Type Support in the System.Xml Classes](~/docs/standard/data/xml/type-support-in-the-system-xml-classes.md) for a list of the default mappings. 類型的元素`xs:int`已經`ValueType`的`System.Int32`預設。An element of type `xs:int` has a `ValueType` of `System.Int32` by default. 不過，`ValueType`可能是其中一個有效型別可以對應至`xs:int`，例如`System.Int16`或`System.Double`。However, the `ValueType` could be one of the valid types that can be mapped to `xs:int`, such as `System.Int16` or `System.Double`. 如果節點是不具類型，或如果該節點是項目包含混合的內容，節點的值會對應到`System.String`型別。If a node is un-typed, or if the node is an element that contains mixed content, the node value is mapped to the `System.String` type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個屬性代表`xml:lang`內目前的節點所在的範圍。This property represents the `xml:lang` scope within which the current node resides. 例如，以下是使用 XML 片段`xml:lang`設為 英文 （美國） 的根項目：For example, here is an XML fragment with `xml:lang` set to US English in the root element: ```xml Fred ``` 當讀取器位於`name`項目，您可以使用這個屬性來尋找它位於範圍內的美式英文`xml:lang`屬性。When the reader is positioned on the `name` element, you can use this property to find that it is in the scope of a US English `xml:lang` attribute. ## Examples 請參閱如使用這個屬性的範例。See for an example of using this property.
